      • Replace

        public static java.lang.String Replace(java.lang.String inStr,
                                       java.lang.String source,
                                       java.lang.String target)
        Replace a source subString with a target string in an input string.
        Parameters:
        inStr - the input base string which will be changed.
        source - the source pattern string which will be changed from.
        target - the target pattern string which will be changed to.
        Returns:
        a string with changed pattern string from inStr.

      • SmartCat

        public static java.lang.String SmartCat(java.lang.String orgStr,
                                        char catChar)
        Concatenate the specified character to the end of a string. Return a blank string if the original string is null.
        Parameters:
        orgStr - the original string to be cancatenated to.
        catChar - the character to be concatened
        Returns:
        a string that represents the concatenation of the original string followed by a cancatenated character. Return a blank string if the original string is null.

      • SmartAddToHead

        public static java.lang.String SmartAddToHead(java.lang.String orgStr,
                                              char catChar)
        Concatenate the specified character to the beginning of a string. Return a blank string if the original string is null.
        Parameters:
        orgStr - the original string to be cancatenated to.
        catChar - the character to be concatened
        Returns:
        a string that represents the concatenation of a specified character and followed by the original string. Return a blank string if the original string is null.

      • SmartCat

        public static java.lang.String SmartCat(java.lang.String orgStr,
                                        java.lang.String catStr)
        Concatenate the specified string to the end of a string. Return a blank string if the original string is null.
        Parameters:
        orgStr - the original string to be cancatenated to.
        catStr - the string to be concatened
        Returns:
        a string that represents the concatenation of the original string followed by a cancatenated string. Return a blank string if the original string is null.
